commits.author: Ted
commits.body: After months of using other tools to minify my JSON, I figured the JSON TM bundle should be able to do this. Sharing with all now.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use current indent type for Reformat Document

commits.author: milligramme
commits.body: This switches the command to using ruby, due to the JSON library only being available in ruby 2.0+ this requires 10.9 or higher.

commits.author: Ram
commits.summary: Add Validate Syntax command - <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃+</kbd><kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⇧+</kbd>V
commits.body:
Add a new command that does syntax validation on the JSON file and shows the
error message in a tooltip. Behaviour is consistent with other language
bundles where syntax validation is implemented.
